entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:24 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Acadie 1:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -4.2°C
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: SW 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
